description: This file defines a Pinia store for managing notes in a frontend application, including types, state, getters, actions, and utility functions.

methods.name: uuid
methods.description: Generates a unique identifier, using crypto if available, otherwise fallback to a random string.

methods.name: nowISO
methods.description: Returns the current date and time in ISO string format.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads notes from local storage or seeds initial data if none exist.

methods.name: persist
methods.description: Saves current notes to local storage.

methods.name: seed
methods.description: Initializes the store with a welcome note.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with provided partial data and adds it to the store.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by id with provided patch data.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Removes a note from the store by id.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a filtered and sorted list of notes based on provided criteria.
